channel.title: git on 轻作
channel.description: Recent content in git on 轻作

item.title: Git工作流
item.description: dev(local) -> dev(remote) -> git stash -> git pull(fetch/merge) -> git stash pop (compatible) -> … ↓ (conflict) ↓ git checkout –theirs . (use theirs(generated ) configure data) ↓ git checkout –ours . (use ours(push) configure data) (not recommend) 本地(dev) ↓ 远程(dev) ↓ 储藏变更(git stash) ↓ 拉取(git pull –rebase(fetch/merge)) ↓ 弹出储藏(git stash pop) 有冲突 ↓ ↓ CI/CD
